title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Back: Detailed Account of Aerial and Artillery Attacks on Terrorist Squad in Zar’it Area”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Earlier this morning, an IDF aircraft identified and attacked a terrorist squad in the Zar’it area. Simultaneously, an IDF force attacked the squad with artillery.

Following alerts in the north of the country, several launches were identified from Lebanese territory towards Israeli territory.

IDF forces are striking with artillery at the sources of the fire.

During the night, a surface-to-air missile was launched towards an IDF aircraft over Lebanese territory. The missile was successfully intercepted by our air defense fighters.
In response to the launch, IDF aircraft attacked the launcher from which the missile was launched and a weapons storage post.
